about_the_game:
If you are a big fan of the 80s and want to see the development of Retrowave World go even further, this supporter pack is for you!

To thank you for your support, you will get some small in-game bonuses:

🌴 Immediately unlock the function to create your own music playlist (this function is unlockable for free in-game at level 15).
🌴 A new character "Gloria"
🌴 A new robot character "Goldia"
🌴 Our eternal gratitude <3
🌴 You are a true Retrowave lover!

Important note: Everything in this pack is simply cosmetic and has no effect on gameplay. Purchasing this DLC is purely to show your support and help us continue development on Retrowave World.

content_descriptors.notes: Some in-game images or characters may have sexy or suggestive outfits.

name: Retrowave World - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64bits
  • Processor: AMD FX 4350 or Equivalent, Intel Core i3 6300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7730, NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640
  • Storage: 19 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Your car's cassette player
  • Additional Notes: Sunglasses and leather jacket are recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: If you are a big fan of the 80s and want to see the development of Retrowave World go even further, this supporter pack is for you!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Korean, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Catalan
